presenting.title: Presentation
personhood_desc: Personhood.online is an experimental application that is used to try out new ideas
for identity management and troll-resistance. It is based on research from the DEDIS
lab at EPFL and actively developed by Linus Gasser. The current version should run
without too many bugs and its goal is to start a discussion of what is possible.
presenting.personhood_link: Personhood is brought to you by
identity_desc: Let's start with getting to know you. The only required field is 'alias', but for more functionality,
you should also fill out the email, the phone-number, and give an URL. Of course you can also do so later.
All of this information will eventually be public on our servers.
asis: This software is given as-is. More specifically: all of your data is stored in clear on our blockchain.
Calls are done unprotected. Coins will disappear. Feel free to open issues on
congrats: Congratulations, you're all set up to go. As is, you are not connected to any of our services.
But you can go around and meet other people who have the app and exchange your identity with them.
This will also start to create your social graph.
parties: You can also visit personhood-parties. They will prove that you're a unique person, and will allow you
to sign up to our experimental blockchain. Once you signed up, your identity can be updated automatically
by all your contacts, if you give them the permission.
next_steps: Once you're signed up you can play a game of rock-paper-scissors on the blockchain.
If you participate in a personhood party, you can create an anonymous, troll-resistant poll.

home.register: To register, get this QRCode scanned by somebody with popcoins, or go to a personhood-party.

score.title: Personhood-score
desc: Your personhood score is an evaluation of how much you can prove that you're a unique human being.
The higher the score, the more the system can trust that your account is uniquely tied to one person only.
score.attributes_improve: Add more information to your identity.
score.registrations_improve: Get yourself registered on the blockchain by somebody who has some coins, or visit a personhood party.
score.registrations_done: Nice. Enjoy staying on the blockchain!
score.meetups_improve: Meet some people and exchange contacts. Only unique meeting groups are counted.
score.parties_improve: Go to a personhood party and get your public key registered.
score.polls_improve: Answer polls to raise your score.
score.invites_improve: Invite and sign up new players.
